definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Job 42:11 ring, always of gold when material mentioned;—´[[נ]] abs. Ge 24:30 +; cstr. v:Ge 24:22 +; sf. [[נִזְמָתּ]] Ho 2:15; pl. [[נְזׇמִים]]Ge 35:4; cstr. [[נִזְמֵי]] Ex 32:2 +;—

nose-ring (Syr.zmomo0 ) woman's ornament, [[עַל־אַפָּהּ]] ´[[נ]] Ge 24:47 cf. v:Ge 24:22, v:Ge 24:30 (J); [[נִזְמֵי הָאָף]] Is 3:21 (‖[[טַבַּ֫עַת]] seal-ring); perh. also Ho 2:15; Ez Eze 16:12 fig. of ´[[י]]'s adorning Jerus. (‖[[עֲגִילִים עַל־אָזְנַיִךְ]]); cf. [[בְּאַף חֲזִיר]] ´[[נ]] Pr 11:22.

earring ornament of men and women, Ge 35:4, [[אֲשֶׁר בְּאָזְנֵיהֶם]] ´[[נ]] so Ex 32:2, Ex 32:3 (all E); cf. Pr 25:12 (in sim. of wise reprover), and perh. Ex 35:22 (P; ‖[[טַבַּ֫עַת]]); prob. also Ju Jdg 8:24, Jdg 8:24, Jdg 8:25, Jdg 8:26 (of men, cf. GFM), Job 42:11.—Cf. further Gei:Jüd. Zeltaschr. x (1872), 45 ff. RS:Sem. i. 434, 2d ed. 453; also ref, sub [[נור]].
